    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:B824_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>B824_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Creating an ethical organisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erstellen einer ethischen Organisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Créer une organisation morale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Criando uma organização ética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Creazione dell'organizzazione etica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημιουργία μιας ηθικής οργάνωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Crear una organización ética</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Businesses are increasingly making explicit their committment to dealing with ethical concerns. This unit explores the business case for an ethical approach to human resources management and examines whether a more 'human-centred' approach can bring dividends, and how an ethical approach fits within an organisation's strategy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Business and Management</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Ethical_approaches</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Ethical_concerns</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Ethics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Human_resources</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Organisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Organisation_strategy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Strategy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäfte bilden in zunehmendem Maße 
ausdrücklich ihr committment zum Beschäftigen ethische Interessen. 
Diese Maßeinheit erforscht den Geschäft Fall für eine 
ethische Annäherung zur menschlichen Betriebsmittelverwaltung und 
überprüft, ob mehr Annäherung kann Dividenden holen ' 
menschlich-zentrierte ' und wie eine ethische Annäherung Sitze 
innerhalb der Strategie einer Organisation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les entreprises font de plus en plus explicite 
leur committment à traiter des soucis moraux. Cette unité 
explore le cas d'affaires pour une approche morale à la gestion de 
ressources humaines et l'examine si davantage 'humain-a centré 
'l'approche peut apporter des dividendes, et comment des ajustements 
moraux d'une approche dans la stratégie d'une organisation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os negócios estão fazendo cada vez mais 
explícito seu committment a tratar dos interesses éticos. Esta
unidade explora o exemplo do negócio para uma aproximação ética à
gerência de recursos humanos e examina-o se mais ' humano-centrou ' a
aproximação pode trazer dividendos, e como ajustes éticos de uma 
aproximação dentro da estratégia de uma organização.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I commerci sempre più stanno rendendo esplicito 
il loro committment ad occuparsi delle preoccupazioni etiche. 
Questa unità esplora il caso di affari per un metodo etico alla
gestione delle risorse umane ed esamina se di più 'umano-ha centrato 
'il metodo può portare i dividendi e come misure etiche di metodo 
all'interno di strategia dell'organizzazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι επιχειρήσεις καθιστούν όλο και περισσότερο ρητό το
committment τους στην εξέταση των ηθικών ανησυχιών. Αυτή 
η μονάδα ερευνά την επιχειρησιακή περίπτωση για στη διαχείριση 
μια ηθική προσέγγιση του ανθρώπινου δυναμικού και εξετάζει εάν 
μια "ανθρώπινος-κεντροθετημένη" προσέγγιση μπορεί να φέρει τα 
μερίσματα, και πώς μια ηθική προσέγγιση εγκαθιστά μέσα στη 
στρατηγική μιας οργάνωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los negocios están haciendo cada vez más 
explícito su committment a ocuparse de preocupaciones éticas. 
Esta unidad explora el caso del negocio para un acercamiento 
ético a la gerencia de recursos humanos y lo examina si ' 
humano-centro' más ' acercamiento puede traer dividendos, y cómo los
ajustes éticos de un acercamiento dentro de la estrategia de una 
organización.</string>
          </description>
